suggestions.original: To further enhance the dimension of deformation, consider experimenting with even more exaggerated and abstract forms. For instance, you could elongate the limbs and bodies of the figures to an even greater extent, or introduce more fluid and dynamic shapes to the background elements. Additionally, incorporating a wider variety of textures and patterns could add depth and complexity to the deformations. Exploring different perspectives and angles might also contribute to a more immersive and impactful visual experience.
